sourcesContent:
import React from 'react';
import styled from 'styled-components';

const LogoContainer = styled.div`
  display: flex;
  align-items: center;
  gap: ${props => props.theme.spacing.sm};
  cursor: pointer;
  transition: ${props => props.theme.transitions.base};
  
  &:hover {
    transform: scale(1.05);
  }
`;

const LogoIcon = styled.div`
  width: ${props => props.size === 'large' ? '48px' : props.size === 'medium' ? '36px' : '28px'};
  height: ${props => props.size === 'large' ? '48px' : props.size === 'medium' ? '36px' : '28px'};
  position: relative;
  display: flex;
  align-items: center;
  justify-content: center;
`;

const LogoText = styled.span`
  font-family: ${props => props.theme.fonts.primary};
  font-weight: ${props => props.theme.fontWeights.bold};
  font-size: ${props => props.size === 'large' ? props.theme.fontSizes['2xl'] : 
                        props.size === 'medium' ? props.theme.fontSizes.xl : 
                        props.theme.fontSizes.lg};
  background: ${props => props.theme.colors.gradientPrimary};
  -webkit-background-clip: text;
  -webkit-text-fill-color: transparent;
  background-clip: text;
  letter-spacing: -0.02em;
`;

const LokanexLogo = ({ size = 'medium', showText = true, ...props }) => {
  return (
    <LogoContainer {...props}>
      <LogoIcon size={size}>
        <svg
          width="100%"
          height="100%"
          viewBox="0 0 100 100"
          fill="none"
          xmlns="http://www.w3.org/2000/svg"
        >
          {/* Outer hexagon frame */}
          <polygon
            points="50,10 80,30 80,70 50,90 20,70 20,30"
            stroke="url(#hexGradient)"
            strokeWidth="2"
            fill="none"
            opacity="0.8"
          />
          
          {/* Inner hexagon */}
          <polygon
            points="50,20 70,35 70,65 50,80 30,65 30,35"
            fill="url(#innerHexGradient)"
            opacity="0.3"
          />
          
          {/* Bold L shape */}
          <path
            d="M35 35 L35 65 L55 65 L55 50 L45 50 L45 35 Z"
            fill="url(#lGradient)"
            stroke="url(#lStroke)"
            strokeWidth="1"
          />
          
          {/* Tech nodes around the L */}
          <circle cx="25" cy="25" r="2.5" fill="url(#node1)" />
          <circle cx="75" cy="25" r="2.5" fill="url(#node2)" />
          <circle cx="25" cy="75" r="2.5" fill="url(#node3)" />
          <circle cx="75" cy="75" r="2.5" fill="url(#node4)" />
          
          {/* Data flow lines */}
          <path d="M25 25 Q50 15 75 25" stroke="url(#flow1)" strokeWidth="1.5" fill="none" opacity="0.6" />
          <path d="M75 25 Q85 50 75 75" stroke="url(#flow2)" strokeWidth="1.5" fill="none" opacity="0.6" />
          <path d="M75 75 Q50 85 25 75" stroke="url(#flow3)" strokeWidth="1.5" fill="none" opacity="0.6" />
          <path d="M25 75 Q15 50 25 25" stroke="url(#flow4)" strokeWidth="1.5" fill="none" opacity="0.6" />
          
          {/* Central glow */}
          <circle cx="50" cy="50" r="15" fill="url(#centerGlow)" opacity="0.4" />
          
          {/* Corner accents */}
          <rect x="15" y="15" width="3" height="3" fill="url(#accent1)" rx="0.5" />
          <rect x="82" y="15" width="3" height="3" fill="url(#accent2)" rx="0.5" />
          <rect x="15" y="82" width="3" height="3" fill="url(#accent3)" rx="0.5" />
          <rect x="82" y="82" width="3" height="3" fill="url(#accent4)" rx="0.5" />
          
          {/* Gradients */}
          <defs>
            <linearGradient id="hexGradient" x1="0%" y1="0%" x2="100%" y2="100%">
              <stop offset="0%" stopColor="#00d4ff" />
              <stop offset="50%" stopColor="#4ecdc4" />
              <stop offset="100%" stopColor="#ff6b35" />
            </linearGradient>
            <linearGradient id="innerHexGradient" x1="0%" y1="0%" x2="100%" y2="100%">
              <stop offset="0%" stopColor="#00d4ff" stopOpacity="0.2" />
              <stop offset="100%" stopColor="#4ecdc4" stopOpacity="0.1" />
            </linearGradient>
            <linearGradient id="lGradient" x1="0%" y1="0%" x2="100%" y2="100%">
              <stop offset="0%" stopColor="#ffffff" />
              <stop offset="30%" stopColor="#00d4ff" />
              <stop offset="70%" stopColor="#4ecdc4" />
              <stop offset="100%" stopColor="#0099cc" />
            </linearGradient>
            <linearGradient id="lStroke" x1="0%" y1="0%" x2="100%" y2="100%">
              <stop offset="0%" stopColor="#00d4ff" />
              <stop offset="100%" stopColor="#4ecdc4" />
            </linearGradient>
            <radialGradient id="node1" cx="50%" cy="50%" r="50%">
              <stop offset="0%" stopColor="#ff6b35" />
              <stop offset="100%" stopColor="#ff8c42" />
            </radialGradient>
            <radialGradient id="node2" cx="50%" cy="50%" r="50%">
              <stop offset="0%" stopColor="#4ecdc4" />
              <stop offset="100%" stopColor="#44a08d" />
            </radialGradient>
            <radialGradient id="node3" cx="50%" cy="50%" r="50%">
              <stop offset="0%" stopColor="#00d4ff" />
              <stop offset="100%" stopColor="#0099cc" />
            </radialGradient>
            <radialGradient id="node4" cx="50%" cy="50%" r="50%">
              <stop offset="0%" stopColor="#ff6b35" />
              <stop offset="100%" stopColor="#ff8c42" />
            </radialGradient>
            <linearGradient id="flow1" x1="0%" y1="0%" x2="100%" y2="0%">
              <stop offset="0%" stopColor="#ff6b35" />
              <stop offset="100%" stopColor="#4ecdc4" />
            </linearGradient>
            <linearGradient id="flow2" x1="0%" y1="0%" x2="0%" y2="100%">
              <stop offset="0%" stopColor="#4ecdc4" />
              <stop offset="100%" stopColor="#00d4ff" />
            </linearGradient>
            <linearGradient id="flow3" x1="100%" y1="0%" x2="0%" y2="0%">
              <stop offset="0%" stopColor="#00d4ff" />
              <stop offset="100%" stopColor="#ff6b35" />
            </linearGradient>
            <linearGradient id="flow4" x1="0%" y1="100%" x2="0%" y2="0%">
              <stop offset="0%" stopColor="#ff6b35" />
              <stop offset="100%" stopColor="#4ecdc4" />
            </linearGradient>
            <radialGradient id="centerGlow" cx="50%" cy="50%" r="50%">
              <stop offset="0%" stopColor="#ffffff" stopOpacity="0.8" />
              <stop offset="70%" stopColor="#00d4ff" stopOpacity="0.3" />
              <stop offset="100%" stopColor="#4ecdc4" stopOpacity="0.1" />
            </radialGradient>
            <linearGradient id="accent1" x1="0%" y1="0%" x2="100%" y2="100%">
              <stop offset="0%" stopColor="#ff6b35" />
              <stop offset="100%" stopColor="#ff8c42" />
            </linearGradient>
            <linearGradient id="accent2" x1="0%" y1="0%" x2="100%" y2="100%">
              <stop offset="0%" stopColor="#4ecdc4" />
              <stop offset="100%" stopColor="#44a08d" />
            </linearGradient>
            <linearGradient id="accent3" x1="0%" y1="0%" x2="100%" y2="100%">
              <stop offset="0%" stopColor="#00d4ff" />
              <stop offset="100%" stopColor="#0099cc" />
            </linearGradient>
            <linearGradient id="accent4" x1="0%" y1="0%" x2="100%" y2="100%">
              <stop offset="0%" stopColor="#ff6b35" />
              <stop offset="100%" stopColor="#ff8c42" />
            </linearGradient>
          </defs>
        </svg>
      </LogoIcon>
      {showText && <LogoText size={size}>Lokanex</LogoText>}
    </LogoContainer>
  );
};

export default LokanexLogo;
